content: परि(री)वाहः {@--1@} Overflowing (of a tank &c.), inundation, overflow, natural or artificial; प्रथमं ( कौतूहलं) सपरिवाहमासीत् <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--2@} A water-course, drain or channel to carry off excess of water; पूरोत्पीडे तडागस्य परीवाहः प्रतिक्रिया <ls>U. 3. 29</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 150</ls>; <ls>Śi. 16. 51</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 74.</ls>
